scripts.build: if [ ! -d './static/fonts/' ]; then cp -r ./node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/fonts/ ./static/fonts/; fi && webpack --config webpack.prod.config.js && zola build
scripts.dev: if [ ! -d './static/fonts/' ]; then cp -r ./node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/fonts/ ./static/fonts/; fi && webpack --config webpack.config.js && zola serve
